job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: The financial industry thrives on data driven decision making You will be joining the team that builds and operates foundational platform used by the rest of Goldman Sachs to apply data science and machine learning to the daily operations of the firm We take the best components from open source and major cloud providers and adapt and expand them to accommodate unique needs of the firm The resulting systems are not only part and parcel of the daily life of hundreds of Goldman Sachs data scientists but also play critical role in the experience of thousands of Goldman Sachs clientsbrbrstronguHow You Will Fulfill Your Potentialbrbrustrongstrong RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS brstrongulli A true greenfield opportunity you will join the team as we embark on creating new scalable and resilient data science tools for a complex industrylili You will collaborate with data scientists and business leaders to understand challenges facing the firm and its clientslili  Your design and development work will contribute to a worldclass client experience and optimize business performancebrliulstronguSkills And Experience We Are Looking Forbrustrongulli 5 years of experience in systems using machine learning and other artificial intelligence techniqueslili Working knowledge of more than one programming language Python R Java C etclili Experience building and operating distributed systems on the cloudlili Experience working closely with data scientists and appreciation for their unique workflowbrliulstronguAbout Goldman SachsbrbrustrongThe Goldman Sachs
